original_title: through the looking glass – of realities and other delusions
overview: The coalescence of physical and digital reality through smart contact lenses. We follow a white rabbit and enter an alternate reality devoid of capitalism but chock-full of unimaginable things. This film reflects the rigid, “unbreakable” construct of (social) reality. It addresses the discovery of the true self or of genuine self-identities in this new world full of possibilities and perspectives.
title: through the looking glass – of realities and other delusions
